English.Text: "Very well," agrees the Prince, once your persuasive speech has come to an end, "My dear cousin asked me to help trace our shared lineage— to establish the validity of certain claims she has through ancestral ties to La Corona." He removes a map of the continent from his neatly-arranged bureau. "Your diplomatic immunity may prove important in the days ahead. What she plans may put her at risk." He sighs. "There is to be a masked ball in Monégasque. You will find her there."
